Key Arguments: The government and its agencies are the main sources of misinformation and disinformation.
The proposed legislation is unnecessary as the government already has enough power to regulate communications.
The legislation is a means to further control and censor public discourse.
The government's response to COVID-19 was based on misinformation and unscientific measures.
The legislation undermines democratic principles and individual freedom to choose what to read or believe.
Notable Quotes: Ironically, it is the government and their puppet agencies who have been, and STILL are, continuing to be the biggest offenders of creating and spreading mis/disinformation.
In a democratic society, I am able to discern what I wish to read.
I say A RESOUNDING NO to your proposed legislation.
